stepOne.footer: A place where you can find your new best friend.

stepTwo.header: Find the right match for you
stepTwo.footer: Find a pet to grow your family or theirs!

stepThree.footer: Post your missing pet or one that you've found.

searches.emptyText: Try a new search, you never know where it will lead
searches.noActiveFiltersToSave: You don't have active filters to save
searches.noFilterLocationRadiusValue: Don't filter littens based on distance
searches.selectUserTypeDesc: You can use this to filter by the type of user, either private individuals or organizations

favourites.emptyFiltersText: Save a frequent filter criteria and they will show up in here
favourites.emptyPostsText: When you heart a post, they will show up in here where you can keep track
favourites.title: Favourites

new.addLocationDescription: Select the location using the map
new.title: New litten

littenPost.cantOpenURL: It seems your device is unable to handle this action
littenPost.emptyContactOptions: It appears {{name}} has no contact options available at this moment. Why not add this litten to your favourites and check back later?
littenPost.selfContactOptions: This is your litten! You can perform edits in your profile and settings tab.

adopt.share: I think you might be interested in {{name}} ! Why don't you check them out on Litten ? {{uri}}

breed.share: I think you might be interested in {{name}} ! Why don't you check them out on Litten ? {{uri}}

found.share: I think you might be looking for {{name}} ! Why don't you check them out on Litten ? {{uri}}

lost.share: Did you find {{name}} ? I think they're lost... Why don't you check them out on Litten ? {{uri}}

messages.emptyText: Start conversations and they will show up in here
messages.title: Messages

profile.aboutBetaRelease: Please note that this is a beta version of the app which is still undergoing final testing before its official release. The app, its software and all content found on it are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. The team does not give any warranties, whether express or implied, as to the suitability or usability of the app, its software or any of its content. The team will not be liable for any loss, whether such loss is direct, indirect, special or consequential, suffered by any party as a result of their use of the app, its software or content. Any downloading or uploading of material to the app is done at the user's own risk and the user will be solely responsible for any damage to any computer system or loss of data that results from such activities. Should you encounter any bugs, glitches, lack of functionality or other problems on the app, please let us know immediately so we can rectify these accordingly. Your help in this regard is greatly appreciated.
profile.postsEmptyText: When you {{createOrArchive}} littens, they will show up in here
profile.viewEmptyUserPosts: This user doesn't have active littens at the moment.

edit.isOrganizationDesc: Set this option if you're using on behalf of an organization. It will label your profile as such and let other users know.

settings.contactCallDesc: Your phone number will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.contactEmailDesc: Your email will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.contactInAppDesc: This option preserves your privacy the most
settings.contactSMSDesc: Your phone number will be shared when someone is interested in your litten
settings.shareMetricsDesc: Analytics are anonymous and allow us to receive automated error reports which we use to improve the overall user experience.
settings.useMetricUnitsDesc: You can choose whether to use the metric or the imperial system. By default, the app will use your device's settings.
settings.themeDesc: You can change the look of the app by selecting a different theme. By default, the app will use your device's theme.

maintenance.crashDescription: Litten encountered an unexpected error. If you've enabled Sharing Litten Analytics, we have received this report automatically. In the meantime, try restarting the app.

betaEnabled.description: We're sorry about this inconvenience, but this beta version of the app is no longer available.
betaEnabled.title: Beta unavailable

maintenanceMode.description: We're sorry about this inconvenience, but the app is currently under maintenance.
maintenanceMode.title: Under maintenance

versionDisabled.description: We're sorry about this inconvenience, but this version of the app is no longer available. Please update.
versionDisabled.title: Version outdated

dev.storybookIntro: You can browse through Litten's UI Elements in this screen

forms.changePhotoDescription: Do you want to replace the current photo?
forms.mapHasNoPermissionsText: We can't access your location. Please give Litten access to your location. You can do so on your device's definitions.
forms.mapInstructions: To change the location on the map, click and drag the marker to the desired position.
forms.name: Name
forms.recoverSentSuccess: Please follow the instructions in your email
forms.registrationTermsAndConditionsMessage: By proceeding to create an account and use Litten, you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
forms.reportDisclaimer: The information you submit is completely anonymous. If you would like a response, please use another way to contact us.
forms.reportErrorMessage: Do you want to report this error?
forms.reportErrorMessageFail: Couldn't submit your feedback, please try again later
forms.reportHasExtraInfo: This report includes information about your conversation.

confirmMessages.clearForm: Are you sure you want to clear the form?
confirmMessages.confirmationEmail: Are you sure you want to verify your email?
confirmMessages.deleteConversation: Are you sure you want to delete the conversation with {{user}}?
confirmMessages.deleteLitten: Are you sure you want to delete the litten {{title}}?
confirmMessages.deleteProfile: All of your littens will be removed and this action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
confirmMessages.enterFilterName: Choose a name to identify this set
confirmMessages.enterPassword: Your password is required for this operation
confirmMessages.resetFilters: Are you sure you want to reset the filters?
confirmMessages.signOut: Are you sure you want to sign out of the app?

errorMessages.checkConnectionText: It seems you don't have an active internet connection.
errorMessages.invalidEmail: Email should be in a valid format
errorMessages.invalidLittenLocation: It would really help to know where your litten is!
errorMessages.invalidLittenPhoto: Consider adding at least one photo.
errorMessages.invalidLittenSpecies: Tell us what species your litten is!
errorMessages.invalidLittenStory: Why not tell us a bit more about your litten?
errorMessages.invalidLittenTitle: Your litten must have a name, no?
errorMessages.invalidLittenType: Tell us why you're creating a new litten.
errorMessages.invalidLocation: The provided location is invalid, try choosing a different one.
errorMessages.invalidPassword: Password should have at least 10 characters
errorMessages.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number should be in a valid format
errorMessages.littenPostMissing: It seems there is a problem with this litten!
errorMessages.newUnverifiefEmail: You need to verify your email address before you can create a new litten! This can be done in your profile settings. You can click this message to go there now.
errorMessages.noCameraPermissions: We can't access your camera. Please give Litten access to your camera. You can do so on your device's definitions.
errorMessages.noLibraryPermissions: We can't access your library. Please give Litten access to your library. You can do so on your device's definitions.
errorMessages.noPhoneNumberDesc: You haven't specified a phone number yet, but you can do so in your profile.
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmail: Your email has not been verified. Click here to resend a confirmation email.
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmailError: Could not verify your email at this time.
errorMessages.profileUnverifiefEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to the provided email. Please check both your inbox and spam folders.
errorMessages.tryAgainLater: There is a problem. Please try again later.

system.allowLocation: Turn on Location Services to allow {{appName}} to determine your location

firebaseErrorMessages.auth/too-many-requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
firebaseErrorMessages.auth/user-not-found: There is no such existing user record

easterEggs.placeholder: If you're seeing this, you are a very special person. This is a development placeholder and should have been removed from the final build.
easterEggs.simulation: We're inside a huge simulation chamber on an alien spaceship.
easterEggs.tribute: This is not The Greatest Post in the World, no. This is just a preview.
